request.description: Don't add username & password of keyclock admin.
This is required step to creation the Organisation of type Board or School(Lern BB - learner-service)

Neo4JDefinationUpdate Job has to trigger (to get the schema data into DB).

Learning service should be running.  

User-token should have below access to create Org

``` json


...
"realm_access": {
    "roles": [
      "offline_access",
      "admin",
      "uma_authorization"
    ]
  },
...

```

item.description:
###   
Neo4J Cypher Queries:

Remove the duplicate nodes if exist while any issues if you noticed as part of configurations  

**Identify the duplicate nodes:**

Use the below cypher query directly on Neo4J DB

``` powershell
match (n:domain{IL_UNIQUE_ID:"ncf_board"}) RETURN n;pppp
```

**Remove the duplicate nodes:**

``` powershell
MATCH (n:domain{IL_UNIQUE_ID:"sunbird_k-12"}) DETACH DELETE n;
```

{
    "request": {
        "action": "save",
        "subType": "resource",
        "framework": "*",
        "rootOrgId": "*",
        "type": "content",
        "popup": true,
        "editMode": true,
        "data": {
            "templateName": "defaultTemplate",
            "action": "save",
            "fields": [
                {
                    "code": "appicon",
                    "visible": true,
                    "editable": true,
                    "dataType": "url",
                    "renderingHints": {},
                    "name": "App Icon",
                    "description": "App Icon",
                    "index": 1,
                    "inputType": "file",
